pr_title: ISPN-12181 Add a 'ready' boolean flag to the login config resource

timeline.message: ISPN-12181 Add a 'ready' boolean flag to the login config resource

timeline.bodyText: should not this be present only in case of properties based, on HTTP mode ?
timeline.author: karesti

replies.bodyText: that's already handled. The default is to return true (LDAP, Kerberos, OAuth, etc). If you have a properties-based realm then it will be dependent on entries being present
replies.author: tristantarrant
